title: Rito why did I this happen to me?
body: Alright so I jumped into a ranked game and the game crashed on me. Which lead my team to remake the game. This happened to me in my promos and I got two losses for something I couldn't even control and on top of that I also got an afk buster. SMH... I didnt even do anything wrong to deserve this and now I might not even get out of bronze just because a stupid server crashed on me :( please help.{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: Idk, I got two losses in my promos instead of one

If the server crashed the game, your team wouldn't have been able to remake since a server-side game crash causes everyone to exit the match. Sounds like your network had some kind of hiccup which caused you to get disconnected and then your team voted to remake. It's not something you can control in the moment, but having an unstable connection can lead to you dc'ing and then leaving your team to 4v5 which is why we have afk penalties. 

Take some time to troubleshoot your game files by running a quick repair, and also cover the rest of your bases by checking up on your network settings with this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
